Package br.ufsc.labsec.signature.conformanceVerifier.cades

Class CadesSigner

java.lang.Object
br.ufsc.labsec.signature.signer.signatureSwitch.SignatureDataWrapperGenerator
br.ufsc.labsec.signature.conformanceVerifier.cades.AbstractCadesSigner
br.ufsc.labsec.signature.conformanceVerifier.cades.CadesSigner
All Implemented Interfaces:
Signer, TimeStampAttributeIncluder
public class CadesSigner extends AbstractCadesSigner implements Signer, TimeStampAttributeIncluder
Esta classe cria uma assinatura CAdES em um documento. Estende AbstractCadesSigner e implementa Signer e TimeStampAttributeIncluder.
